net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_RollExpression_setOnCritAdd
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Defines the number of dice to add to a critable roll when an associated d20 expression rolls a natural 20. If the provided RollExpression does not explicitly or implicitly have the "critable" type, it will be added. If onCritAdd is not specified, the value in 'diceRolled' is assumed, thus doubling the total number of dice to roll.
arg (0) = RollExpression arg (1) = The number of dice to add for a critical damage roll
Returns RollExpression
